Follow<S>1377</S> after charity<S>26</S>, and<S>1161</S> desire<S>2206</S> spiritual<S>4152</S> gifts, but<S>1161</S> rather<S>3123</S> that<S>2443</S> ye may prophesy<S>4395</S>.
For<S>1063</S> he that speaketh<S>2980</S> in an unknown tongue<S>1100</S> speaketh<S>2980</S> not<S>3756</S> unto men<S>444</S>, but<S>235</S> unto God<S>2316</S>: for<S>1063</S> no man<S>3762</S> understandeth<S>191</S> him; howbeit<S>1161</S> in the spirit<S>4151</S> he speaketh<S>2980</S> mysteries<S>3466</S>. <sup>understandeth: Gr. heareth</sup>
But<S>1161</S> he that prophesieth<S>4395</S> speaketh<S>2980</S> unto men<S>444</S> to edification<S>3619</S>, and<S>2532</S> exhortation<S>3874</S>, and<S>2532</S> comfort<S>3889</S>.
He that speaketh<S>2980</S> in an unknown tongue<S>1100</S> edifieth<S>3618</S> himself<S>1438</S>; but<S>1161</S> he that prophesieth<S>4395</S> edifieth<S>3618</S> the church<S>1577</S>.
<S>1161</S> I would<S>2309</S> that ye<S>5209</S> all<S>3956</S> spake<S>2980</S> with tongues<S>1100</S>, but<S>1161</S> rather<S>3123</S> that<S>2443</S> ye prophesied<S>4395</S>: for<S>1063</S> greater<S>3187</S> is he that prophesieth<S>4395</S> than<S>2228</S> he that speaketh<S>2980</S> with tongues<S>1100</S>, except<S>1622</S> <S>1508</S> he interpret<S>1329</S>, that<S>2443</S> the church<S>1577</S> may receive<S>2983</S> edifying<S>3619</S>.
<S>1161</S> Now<S>3570</S>, brethren<S>80</S>, if<S>1437</S> I come<S>2064</S> unto<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S> speaking<S>2980</S> with tongues<S>1100</S>, what<S>5101</S> shall I profit<S>5623</S> you<S>5209</S>, except<S>3362</S> I shall speak<S>2980</S> to you<S>5213</S> either<S>2228</S> by<S>1722</S> revelation<S>602</S>, or<S>2228</S> by<S>1722</S> knowledge<S>1108</S>, or<S>2228</S> by<S>1722</S> prophesying<S>4394</S>, or<S>2228</S> by<S>1722</S> doctrine<S>1322</S>?
And even<S>3676</S> things without life<S>895</S> giving<S>1325</S> sound<S>5456</S>, whether<S>1535</S> pipe<S>836</S> or<S>1535</S> harp<S>2788</S>, except<S>3362</S> they give<S>1325</S> a distinction<S>1293</S> in the sounds<S>5353</S>, how<S>4459</S> shall it be known<S>1097</S> what is piped<S>832</S> or<S>2228</S> harped<S>2789</S>? <sup>sounds: or, tunes</sup>
For<S>1063</S> <S>2532</S> if<S>1437</S> the trumpet<S>4536</S> give<S>1325</S> an uncertain<S>82</S> sound<S>5456</S>, who<S>5101</S> shall prepare himself<S>3903</S> to<S>1519</S> the battle<S>4171</S>?
So<S>3779</S> likewise<S>2532</S> ye<S>5210</S>, except<S>3362</S> ye utter<S>1325</S> by<S>1223</S> the tongue<S>1100</S> words<S>3056</S> easy to be understood<S>2154</S>, how<S>4459</S> shall it be known<S>1097</S> what is spoken<S>2980</S>? for<S>1063</S> ye shall<S>2071</S> speak<S>2980</S> into<S>1519</S> the air<S>109</S>. <sup>easy: Gr. significant</sup>
<S>1487</S> There are<S>2076</S>, it may be<S>5177</S>, so many<S>5118</S> kinds<S>1085</S> of voices<S>5456</S> in<S>1722</S> the world<S>2889</S>, and<S>2532</S> none of them<S>3762</S> is without signification<S>880</S> <S>846</S>.
Therefore<S>3767</S> if<S>3362</S> I know<S>1492</S> not<S>3362</S> the meaning<S>1411</S> of the voice<S>5456</S>, I shall be<S>2071</S> unto him that speaketh<S>2980</S> a barbarian<S>915</S>, and<S>2532</S> he that speaketh<S>2980</S> shall be a barbarian<S>915</S> unto<S>1722</S> me<S>1698</S>.
Even<S>2532</S> so<S>3779</S> ye<S>5210</S>, forasmuch as<S>1893</S> ye are<S>2075</S> zealous<S>2207</S> of spiritual<S>4151</S> gifts, seek<S>2212</S> that<S>2443</S> ye may excel<S>4052</S> to<S>4314</S> the edifying<S>3619</S> of the church<S>1577</S>. <sup>of spiritual gifts: Gr. of spirits</sup>
Wherefore<S>1355</S> let him that speaketh<S>2980</S> in an unknown tongue<S>1100</S> pray<S>4336</S> that<S>2443</S> he may interpret<S>1329</S>.
For<S>1063</S> if<S>1437</S> I pray<S>4336</S> in an unknown tongue<S>1100</S>, my<S>3450</S> spirit<S>4151</S> prayeth<S>4336</S>, but<S>1161</S> my<S>3450</S> understanding<S>3563</S> is<S>2076</S> unfruitful<S>175</S>.
What<S>5101</S> is it<S>2076</S> then<S>3767</S>? I will pray<S>4336</S> with the spirit<S>4151</S>, and<S>1161</S> I will pray<S>4336</S> with the understanding<S>3563</S> also<S>2532</S>: I will sing<S>5567</S> with the spirit<S>4151</S>, and<S>1161</S> I will sing<S>5567</S> with the understanding<S>3563</S> also<S>2532</S>.
Else<S>1893</S> when<S>1437</S> thou shalt bless<S>2127</S> with the spirit<S>4151</S>, how<S>4459</S> shall he that occupieth<S>378</S> the room<S>5117</S> of the unlearned<S>2399</S> say<S>2046</S> Amen<S>281</S> at<S>1909</S> thy<S>4674</S> giving of thanks<S>2169</S>, seeing<S>1894</S> he understandeth<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> what<S>5101</S> thou sayest<S>3004</S>?
For<S>1063</S> thou<S>4771</S> verily<S>3303</S> givest thanks<S>2168</S> well<S>2573</S>, but<S>235</S> the other<S>2087</S> is<S>3618</S> not<S>3756</S> edified<S>3618</S>.
I thank<S>2168</S> my<S>3450</S> God<S>2316</S>, I speak<S>2980</S> with tongues<S>1100</S> more than<S>3123</S> ye<S>5216</S> all<S>3956</S>:
Yet<S>235</S> in<S>1722</S> the church<S>1577</S> I had rather<S>2309</S> speak<S>2980</S> five<S>4002</S> words<S>3056</S> with<S>1223</S> my<S>3450</S> understanding<S>3563</S>, that<S>2443</S> by my voice I might teach<S>2727</S> others<S>243</S> also<S>2532</S>, than<S>2228</S> ten thousand<S>3463</S> words<S>3056</S> in<S>1722</S> an unknown tongue<S>1100</S>.
Brethren<S>80</S>, be<S>1096</S> not<S>3361</S> children<S>3813</S> in understanding<S>5424</S>: howbeit<S>235</S> in malice<S>2549</S> be ye children<S>3515</S>, but<S>1161</S> in understanding<S>5424</S> be<S>1096</S> men<S>5046</S>. <sup>men: Gr. perfect, or, of a ripe age</sup>
In<S>1722</S> the law<S>3551</S> it is written<S>1125</S>,<S>3754</S> With<S>1722</S> men of other tongues<S>2084</S> and<S>2532</S> other<S>1722</S> <S>2087</S> lips<S>5491</S> will I speak<S>2980</S> unto this<S>5129</S> people<S>2992</S>; and<S>2532</S> yet for all<S>3779</S> that will they<S>1522</S> not<S>3761</S> hear<S>1522</S> me<S>3450</S>, saith<S>3004</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>.
Wherefore<S>5620</S> tongues<S>1100</S> are<S>1526</S> for<S>1519</S> a sign<S>4592</S>, not<S>3756</S> to them that believe<S>4100</S>, but<S>235</S> to them that believe not<S>571</S>: but<S>1161</S> prophesying<S>4394</S> serveth not<S>3756</S> for them that believe not<S>571</S>, but<S>235</S> for them which believe<S>4100</S>.
If<S>1437</S> therefore<S>3767</S> the whole<S>3650</S> church<S>1577</S> be come together<S>4905</S> into<S>1909</S> one place<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> speak<S>2980</S> with tongues<S>1100</S>, and<S>1161</S> there come in<S>1525</S> those that are unlearned<S>2399</S>, or<S>2228</S> unbelievers<S>571</S>, will they<S>2046</S> not<S>3756</S> say<S>2046</S> that<S>3754</S> ye are mad<S>3105</S>?
But<S>1161</S> if<S>1437</S> all<S>3956</S> prophesy<S>4395</S>, and<S>1161</S> there come in<S>1525</S> one<S>5100</S> that believeth not<S>571</S>, or<S>2228</S> one unlearned<S>2399</S>, he is convinced<S>1651</S> of<S>5259</S> all<S>3956</S>, he is judged<S>350</S> of<S>5259</S> all<S>3956</S>:
And<S>2532</S> thus<S>3779</S> are<S>1096</S> the secrets<S>2927</S> of his<S>846</S> heart<S>2588</S> made<S>1096</S> manifest<S>5318</S>; and<S>2532</S> so<S>3779</S> falling down<S>4098</S> on<S>1909</S> his face<S>4383</S> he will worship<S>4352</S> God<S>2316</S>, and report<S>518</S> that<S>3754</S> God<S>2316</S> is<S>2076</S> in<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S> of a truth<S>3689</S>.
How<S>5101</S> is it<S>2076</S> then<S>3767</S>, brethren<S>80</S>? when<S>3752</S> ye come together<S>4905</S>, every one<S>1538</S> of you<S>5216</S> hath<S>2192</S> a psalm<S>5568</S>, hath<S>2192</S> a doctrine<S>1322</S>, hath<S>2192</S> a tongue<S>1100</S>, hath<S>2192</S> a revelation<S>602</S>, hath<S>2192</S> an interpretation<S>2058</S>. Let<S>1096</S> all things<S>3956</S> be done<S>1096</S> unto<S>4314</S> edifying<S>3619</S>.
If<S>1535</S> any man<S>5100</S> speak<S>2980</S> in an unknown tongue<S>1100</S>, let it be by<S>2596</S> two<S>1417</S>, or<S>2228</S> at the most<S>4118</S> by three<S>5140</S>, and<S>2532</S> that by<S>303</S> course<S>3313</S>; and<S>2532</S> let<S>1329</S> one<S>1520</S> interpret<S>1329</S>. <sup>two: by two or three sentences separately</sup>
But<S>1161</S> if<S>3362</S> there be<S>5600</S> no<S>3362</S> interpreter<S>1328</S>, let him keep silence<S>4601</S> in<S>1722</S> the church<S>1577</S>; and<S>1161</S> let him speak<S>2980</S> to himself<S>1438</S>, and<S>2532</S> to God<S>2316</S>.
<S>1161</S> Let<S>2980</S> the prophets<S>4396</S> speak<S>2980</S> two<S>1417</S> or<S>2228</S> three<S>5140</S>, and<S>2532</S> let<S>1252</S> the other<S>243</S> judge<S>1252</S>.
If<S>1161</S> <S>1437</S> any thing be revealed<S>601</S> to another<S>243</S> that sitteth by<S>2521</S>, let<S>4601</S> the first<S>4413</S> hold his peace<S>4601</S>.
For<S>1063</S> ye may<S>1410</S> all<S>3956</S> prophesy<S>4395</S> one by one<S>2596</S> <S>1520</S>, that<S>2443</S> all<S>3956</S> may learn<S>3129</S>, and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> may be comforted<S>3870</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the spirits<S>4151</S> of the prophets<S>4396</S> are subject<S>5293</S> to the prophets<S>4396</S>.
For<S>1063</S> God<S>2316</S> is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> the author of confusion<S>181</S>, but<S>235</S> of peace<S>1515</S>, as<S>5613</S> in<S>1722</S> all<S>3956</S> churches<S>1577</S> of the saints<S>40</S>. <sup>confusion: Gr. tumult, or, unquietness</sup>
Let<S>4601</S> your<S>5216</S> women<S>1135</S> keep silence<S>4601</S> in<S>1722</S> the churches<S>1577</S>: for<S>1063</S> it is<S>2010</S> not<S>3756</S> permitted<S>2010</S> unto them<S>846</S> to speak<S>2980</S>; but<S>235</S> they are commanded to be under obedience<S>5293</S>, as<S>2531</S> also<S>2532</S> saith<S>3004</S> the law<S>3551</S>.
And<S>1161</S> if<S>1487</S> they will<S>2309</S> learn<S>3129</S> any thing<S>5100</S>, let them ask<S>1905</S> their<S>2398</S> husbands<S>435</S> at<S>1722</S> home<S>3624</S>: for<S>1063</S> it is<S>2076</S> a shame<S>149</S> for women<S>1135</S> to speak<S>2980</S> in<S>1722</S> the church<S>1577</S>.
What<S>2228</S>? came<S>1831</S> the word<S>3056</S> of God<S>2316</S> out<S>1831</S> from<S>575</S> you<S>5216</S>? or<S>2228</S> came it<S>2658</S> unto<S>1519</S> you<S>5209</S> only<S>3441</S>?
If any man<S>1536</S> think himself<S>1380</S> to be<S>1511</S> a prophet<S>4396</S>, or<S>2228</S> spiritual<S>4152</S>, let him acknowledge<S>1921</S> that<S>3754</S> the things<S>3739</S> that I write<S>1125</S> unto you<S>5213</S> are<S>1526</S> the commandments<S>1785</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S>.
But<S>1161</S> if any man<S>1536</S> be ignorant<S>50</S>, let him be ignorant<S>50</S>.
Wherefore<S>5620</S>, brethren<S>80</S>, covet<S>2206</S> to prophesy<S>4395</S>, and<S>2532</S> forbid<S>2967</S> not<S>3361</S> to speak<S>2980</S> with tongues<S>1100</S>.
Let<S>1096</S> all things<S>3956</S> be done<S>1096</S> decently<S>2156</S> and<S>2532</S> in<S>2596</S> order<S>5010</S>.
